videos.description: Jerami Grant stuffs Daniel Theis' dunk attempt down low.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Grant denies Theis entry at the rim) 2021/2/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Grant denies Theis entry at the rim

videos.description: Rookie Saddiq Bey drops a career-high 30 points, going 7-for-7 from beyond the 3-point line, as the Pistons weather the Celtics' comeback attempt.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Rookie Saddiq Bey perfect from 3 as Pistons top Celtics on the road) 2021/2/12 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Rookie Saddiq Bey perfect from 3 as Pistons top Celtics on the road
